name: Inability to validate effectiveness of preservation
description: Repository is incapable of effectively determining the extent to which its preservation activities are successful in terms of its business objectives.
notes:
- Does repository maintain policies and procedures to verify the preservation of information understandability, authenticity and integrity? 

The full description of this risk has been obtained from examples provided in DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment, March 2007, Digital Curation Centre (DCC) and Digital Preservation Europe (DPE), http://www.repositoryaudit.eu/
preMitigationNotes: - Repository lacks means to demonstrate continued preservation, including understandability to the appropriate user communities, of its holdings over a number of years, given the age of the repository and its holdings
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Establish internal means of assessment including risk management
- Seek relevant external certification in order to demonstrate competence
identifiedBy: DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment
